alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 5:52PM AKST until December 26 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW CONTINUES OVER THE SOUTHEAST PANHANDLE OVERNIGHT... .Snow continues to be heavy to moderate over the Misty Fjords area overnight. Another round of snow is expected for the northern panhandle Sun afternoon into Sun night with light to moderate accumulations. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 3 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph mainly on the Klondike Highway. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From noon Sunday to 3 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest snow rates will be Sun evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
